item.description:
Gracy would like to invite all of you to join her at The Barkwood Inn in Charlton for a meetup. The Barkwood is a fun and safe place for the bullies to run. It is fenced in and has an indoor/outdoor area for play. Plenty of fresh water (and dishes) as well as waste disposal will be provided. There are a few requirements for this meetup. The Barkwood Inn would need to receive proof of Rabies,D/H/L/P, and Kennel Cough vaccines,also a negative fecal read done within the past year. All info can be faxed or mailed to Gracy ATTN:Kim prior to May 1,2010. This will insure the safety to the guests of The Barkwood Inn as well as all of our meetup friends. There will be an $8.00 charge per bulldog to be paid at time of meetup. The meetups will be held in the evenings for about 1 1/2 hrs. I am hoping for a great turnout so we can plan monthly meetups here at The Barkwood.

Kim Lachance Fax: (508)434-0494
462 Worcester Rd.
Charlton,Ma.01507
item.how_to_find_us: We are right on RT.20 on the Oxford/Charlton line. Google us!

group.name: The Worcester English Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: The Barkwood Inn
